```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(tigerstats)
require(tidyverse)
require(knitr)
```

## R table


```{r}
groupsize = 44000
subgp = groupsize/2
vacine = c(subgp-9,9)
placebo =  c(subgp-85,85)
results = as.table(cbind(vacine,placebo))
rownames(results) <- c("none","covid")

```

```{r}
barchartGC(results,type = "percent")
```

```{r}
fisher.test(results)
```
